InventoryID: London Market, Charles Ede Ltd., ex Sotheby, Sale Cat. 8Non Sepcified9 Dec. 1986, no. 191
Imagery Description: (a) Seated halfNon Sepcifieddraped woman to l., holding tambourine and thyrsus, (b) nude youth moving to left, with a piece of red drapery, patterned with white dotNon Sepcifiedclusters, over his l. arm and across his r. thigh.
Additional Notes: The vase was listed in the Sale Catalogue as Apulian, but it is Paestan and belongs here; in style it is also comparable with nos. 343Non Sepcified6.
